3: (Picks up the head of a guard) Its... central nervous system is still intact...
Even when the Punishing Virus is waning... I can still hack into mechanical parts...
A faint hint of scarlet red enters the guard's system chip...
It's likely the blueprint of the Golden Vortex's engines... I guess luck is still on my side...
(Stares at the head) You... were patrolling the engines, weren't you...
But! It could still be a trap... There's no way Nat would've made this kind of mistake...
(The antigen attaching to his arm gradually increases) Even if it's a trap... I don't have many options, anyway...
Infect the engines... might be... the best way I can destroy the Golden Vortex right now...
I can't let the golden antigen spread to other continents... The Ascendants' plan would be threatened...
My power... I don't have long...
I guess... I'll have to do that now...
I guess... I'll have to try that now...
Head toward my target... Remove all obstacles...
